features: UNIVERSAL DESIGN AND WASTE REDUCING: No need for paper or plastic cups, we’ve included a 14-Oz. stainless steel #304 interior insulated travel mug that fits perfectly under coffee dispensers and most cup holders so fresh coffee is always ready for you. Just Click, Brew and Go.

QUICK INSTANT BREW TIME: With the Elite Gourmet personal single-serve coffee maker, you can brew fresh coffee at home in under 60 seconds. It’s great for “On the go mornings or a quick pick me up to save valuable time for your busy life.

EASY ONE-TOUCH OPERATION: Enjoy hot and freshly brewed coffee fast with this stylish, compact 600-Watt coffee maker. The one-touch operation allows you to quickly and easily brew up to 14 oz. of tasty coffee at the perfect temperature without the long wait at your local coffee house.

BREW GROUNDS: Brew a cup of coffee exactly how you want it with fresh coffee grounds. No more paper filters, we’ve included a removable & reusable filter for use with coffee grounds and loose-leaf tea.

EVERYTHING YOU NEED: The Elite Gourmet Personal Single-Serve Coffee Maker has everything you need to enjoy hot fresh coffee. Comes complete with coffee maker base, travel mug, lid and reusable filter.
SAFETY FEATURES: We know that you’re busy and safety is important so we equipped our single serve coffee maker with auto-shut off and a thermal reset switch to prevent overheating.
PORTABLE, SPACE SAVING DESIGN: The compact narrow and lightweight design fits and stores into small spaces making it easy for portability for use on vacations, dorms, offices, or small kitchens.

DURABLE AND EASY TO CLEAN: Constructed using high-quality, durable materials so you can enjoy great tasting coffee for years to come. Easy to clean and dishwasher safe (excluding the coffee maker base).
body.description: The Elite Gourmet Personal Single Serve Coffee Maker features a compact and sleek design that takes up limited counter space and fits into any nook. Perfect for small spaces such as office kitchens, dorm rooms or recreational vehicles. Quickly and effortlessly brew your favorite coffee blend to jump start your day. The coffee maker includes a 14-Oz. #304 stainless steel insulated travel mug that fits perfectly under the dispenser so fresh coffee is always ready for you. The simple one touch push button feature allows you to operate with ease. No need to stop at a local coffee house to buy a cup of joe just to make it through the day. Use coffee grounds in the included reusable filter. Simply add fresh water for each brew. Cleanup is a cinch, all removable parts and accessories are dishwasher safe. Enjoy a cup of joe on the go with the Elite Gourmet Single Serve Personal Coffee Maker!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 7, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Better than coffee from pods
reviews.reviewText: This little coffee maker is perfect for single servings of coffee. It makes a good hot cup of coffee. The stainless steel mug keeps the drink piping hot for hours. It's cheaper because it uses bulk coffee instead of single serve pods. Its easy to quickly clean and dispose of the grounds. The filter works well and there's no need to buy paper filters. I pull out the pot, brew a cup, dump the grounds, then tuck the coffee maker to the back of the counter... taking up very little space on the counter.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on June 30, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars HOT coffee every time
reviews.reviewText: If you like HOT coffee, this little single serve coffee maker is for you! Impressive! No coffee maker in my life has ever brewed coffee hot enough for my liking until I bought this one. It is so easy to use, the insulated cup is very insulated, the coffee is hot and remains hot. Impressive 14 oz mug. Can't be more happy with this purchase. There was a bit of a delay in shipping and arrived a few days later than promised, but other than that, great seller. Coffee maker is exactly as described. Perfect coffee maker for one person. The Elite Gourmet EHC111A Personal Single-Serve Compact Coffee Maker Brewer has the 14Oz. mug that has a sip top. LOVE THIS COFFEEMAKER. HOT COFFEE FINALLY (and I am a person who has had many coffee makers in my life and always have to put the coffee into the microwave to get it hot enough). NOT WITH THIS ONE. HIGHLY RECOMMEND! very cute, too. P.S. I have a BUNN coffee maker and it was expensive. I have had for some years. This little coffee maker beats it and for about $25 vs $180 ....the BUNN is too big for one person. This coffee maker is perfect and I don't have to keep it plugged in forever to keep the tank water hot 24/7. This I will be saving money on my electric bill, too. Fast brewing and HOT coffee are key. BRAVO ELITE GOURMET! BRAVO.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 11, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Not a bad single cup maker
reviews.reviewText: It's small and compact. And brews great. The only think I don't like is the filter. It comes with a reusable filter but the coffee goes through it fast . You end up with a weak cup of coffee. What I done to fix the problem is I poke a hole in a cup cake paper and it fit perfectly inside the reusable filter. The coffee brews longer for a better tasting cup of coffee. It will be expensive to use baking cups for filters so I'm looking for some small filters that will work.Update. What works great is I regular coffee filter sandwich between the basket and the reusable filter

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 21, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Best Coffee Maker!
reviews.reviewText: This is by far the best Lil coffee maker that I ever had, and in 75 yrs. I've had plenty.It is compact, very easy to clean and the biggest surprise, the coffee is piping hot just the way I like it.It is well made and convenient.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 20, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Is simple and fast!
reviews.reviewText: I've had this a couple months and I can't say enough good about it. It's fast, easy to clean and use. On button could be improved but it seems to work fine. It comes with a nice travel mug too. I wish it had a little bit bigger mug but over all, for the money, you won't be disappointed. Makes a good cup of tea too!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on May 6, 2023
reviews.reviewText: I bought this to replace another type of coffee pot I just bought on Amazon. The first one worked ok but it had a terrible plastic, chemical smell to it no matter how much I washed it and aired it out. It was impossible to use. this new on is great.. no coffee pot the coffee goes right into the supplied thermal mug or your own coffee cup. No chemical smell. Easy to clean. The first coffee pot had a plastic filter that discolored right after the first use and you could not get the stains out of the filter. The new coffee maker has a dedicated filter as well..plastic one but it does not stain, very easy to clean. It brews fast and the coffee is very hot. I am single and live alone and this is perfect. If I had to make a second cup it would be an easy and fast thing to do..no problems. The color works great with my retro microwave and small toaster oven and my fridge. All in the same family color.. Anyway I am very happy with it. Also the thermal coffee mug that comes with it is very nice. I use it all of the time now instead of a regular coffee mug. But I could use one of my a regular coffee mugs if I wanted to..Ok I have to add an edit. The coffee maker lasted about 15 cups of coffee and than started to brew just a half a cup or a quarter of a cup. The rest of the water stayed in the coffee maker. I returned it for an exchange. The new one came and right out of the box it would only brew a quarter of a cup and the rest of the water stayed in the coffee maker. I tried all types of things with both coffee makers, plugged and unplugged, let cool down and such.. left it alone for a day but it failed to complete the brewing cycle. Too bad as I liked the coffee maker and the look and color of it but it failed to work. So the search goes on.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 23, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 3.0 out of 5 stars It was great while it worked
reviews.reviewText: The media could not be loaded. Well I was happy while it worked, simple and fast brew, used it in my office for an afternoon pick me up, used it 4 to 5 times now the on/off switch won't work, it won't stay on, bummer !

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 5, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Makes good coffee, but beware!
reviews.reviewText: For years I've been the only one drinking coffee at home, so I always used a stainless steel funnel to make my coffee and save counter space. That's changed now with one of our family taking a cup to work and another staying at home. So the old manual method became a bit of a pain! Elite Gourmet fit the bill. There's no denying that this is a simple device but it's extremely versatile and easy to use. I don't like those Kurig machines because I personally like a strong cup. With this machine I can load it with plenty of coffee and choose to make only 8 oz. Perfect! Others like to make a full 14 oz. flask of mild coffee - no problem. The great thing too is that once you push the button you can walk away, rather than standing over and pouring into my old funnel. But beware!!! Don't forget to put the cup under! There is no emergency stop button. Please, it's not what you want to deal with in a morning if you are in a hurry.One more thing to note, is that the cup it comes with it has only a push-on lid. For those in a rush that's a potential mess waiting to happen. We use another screw on lid flask now but that doesn't fit under the machine so we have to fill another cup and transfer it to the flask. No big deal because I use the flask at home. The lid on the flask keeps the coffee warm on my desk. This is a good solution - small footprint, simple and practical. Reasonably price too. Love it.

Llevo un año usando esta cafetera compacta y estoy muy feliz con ella. No ha fallado para nada y la uso constantemente, es perfecta para el café de la oficina, la casa. El termo es una genial opción para llevar el café a la calle o en el auto.No quema el café, es super funcional y fácil de usar.¡Totalmente recomendable!

Es muy sencilla pero la verdad bastante funcional. Creo que obtienes justamente lo que pagas. Si solo quieres un café en la mañana al presionar un botón y no buscas nada más, adelante es buena opción. El termo es muy bonito.

reviews.reviewTitle: love it - works like a charm!
reviews.reviewText: Brews coffee fast and taste good! Piping hot too!I love this coffee maker!

reviews.reviewTitle: PARA CALENTAR AGUA MUY BIEN, CAFÉ NO.
reviews.reviewText: Hay mejores, pero por el precio ya sabes bien lo que vas a recibir.
